00043 typedef uint32_t SYS_DuplicateMask_t;
00044 
00046 typedef struct _SYS_DuplicateTableEntry_t
00047 {
00048   uint16_t address; 
00049   uint8_t seqNumber; 
00050   uint8_t ttl; 
00051 #ifdef _DUPLICATE_REJECTION_TABLE_BIT_MASK_ENABLE_
00052   /* The mask indicates received packets from particular node. */
00053   SYS_DuplicateMask_t mask;
00054 #endif // _DUPLICATE_REJECTION_TABLE_BIT_MASK_ENABLE_
00055 } SYS_DuplicateTableEntry_t;
00056 
00057 /* Type of structure which contains internal states of a rejection table. */
00058 typedef struct _SYS_DuplicateTable_t
00059 {
00061   bool removeOldest:1;
00062   /* Current size of the table. */
00063   uint8_t size:7;
00064   /* A pointer to the duplicate rejection table from configServer. */
00065   SYS_DuplicateTableEntry_t *entries;
00066   /* Variable to track timeout and to age out an entry. */
00067   uint16_t agingPeriod;
00068   uint32_t lastStamp;
00069   uint8_t maxTTL;
00070 #ifdef _DUPLICATE_REJECTION_TABLE_BIT_MASK_ENABLE_
00071   uint8_t maskSize; 
00072 #endif // _DUPLICATE_REJECTION_TABLE_BIT_MASK_ENABLE_
00073 } SYS_DuplicateTable_t ;
